overview: Moms excited and a little concerned when her gorgeous unbalanced daughter starts working for an eccentric writer. Perhaps the script hes writing is all about kink - but then again, maybe hes just into bondage and discipline! Watch Marley get whipped into shape in this exciting adventure into B&D! Starring vivacious Marley Brinx with Tommy Pistol as the unusual writer. Marcus London is the Master with sinsational Cadence Lux and Adrian Maya as his discipline playtoys. Also starring Logan Pierce as the vanilla boyfriend and Kylie Ireland as the Mom.
title: Shades of Kink 6
